description: Designed in partnership with Kalen Thorien, these hiking socks use a merino wool blend and seamless construction to keep your feet happy on the way to the summit. An Achilles strap protects your ankles from rocks and other trail debris.4-degree elite fit system uses 2 types of elastic for stretch, recovery and to keep the sock in place.Indestructawool Technology in high-impact areas for comfort.Mesh ventilation zones provide moisture management.Virtually Seamless™ toe for chafe-free wear.Narrower profile suits those with narrower feet.
name: Smartwool PhD Pro Hike Crew Socks - Women's
